title: EMAIL
description: eMail is a communication type used in customer communication. eMail includes the eMail address.

isStandardEmail.title: isStandardE-Mail
isStandardEmail.description: This field indicates that this Email Is the Standard Email for a defined use.

doNotUseFlag.title: doNotUseFlag
doNotUseFlag.description: The Do not Use Flag indicates that a particular Communication Number is Not Used.
